title: Weekend Roundup: VR to the Tour de France départ, Sagan collection, Win Lezyne & more!
content:
Immerse yourself virtually in Team DSM’s lead up to the Tour de France – To deliver a more immersive perspective on Team DSM’s prep for the Grand Tours they’ve put together a virtual reality experience that gives fans a “unique look behind-the-scenes of with real life 360˚ scenes”. The first episode ‘Be the best you […]
